Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Celeste's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that she worked as a researcher on Bloodsworth Island alongside Jeremiah and Virgil .
Post-Apocalypse[]: Celeste is discovered in a jail cell alongside Jeremiah and Lucy by Michonne shortly after she is captured by Virgil. However, she and her friends are freed after Michonne gains the upper hand on Virgil and escapes from the jail. While the survivors capture Virgil, they spare his life and allow him to remain on the island as they take a boat and leave the island.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Celeste has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
